content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much are you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I have a tight budget, so I was thinking about 500 euros per month. It would be perfect for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is much lower than my expectations for this prime location. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the apartment and the amenities it offers. Would you be willing to consider a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I can understand that. I really like the apartment, so I am willing to pay a higher price. How about 700 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 700 euros is more in line with what I had in mind. However, considering the recent increase in demand for rental properties in the city center, I think we could push this a bit further. Would you be willing to go up to 800 euros? That would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 750 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 750 euros is still below my asking price. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the market value of the property. Would you be willing to go up to 800 euros? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Okay, I understand. I really like the apartment, so I am willing to pay 800 euros per month.

[yourname], if you want to accept this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' where x is the agreed-upon price.]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
